name: StreamSocketSecurityLevel
desc: NSStream defines these string constants for specifying the secure-socket layer (SSL) security level.

items.name: static let negotiatedSSL: StreamSocketSecurityLevel
items.desc: Specifies that the highest level security protocol that can be negotiated be set as the security protocol for a socket stream.

items.name: static let none: StreamSocketSecurityLevel
items.desc: Specifies that no security level be set for a socket stream.

items.name: static let ssLv2: StreamSocketSecurityLevel
items.desc: Specifies that SSL version 2 be set as the security protocol for a socket stream.

items.name: static let ssLv3: StreamSocketSecurityLevel
items.desc: Specifies that SSL version 3 be set as the security protocol for a socket stream.

items.name: static let tlSv1: StreamSocketSecurityLevel
items.desc: Specifies that TLS version 1 be set as the security protocol for a socket stream.
